sense.def:
The condition of someone or something
je stanje, v katerem nekdo ali nekaj je.

seg.quote: You can't go home in that condition.
Keep your car exterior in good condition.

sense.def:
The conditions
so značilnosti ali dejavniki, v katerih ljudje živijo ali delajo in ki vplivajo na njihovo udobje, varnost ali uspešnost.

A condition
je nekaj, kar se mora zgoditi, da bi se potem lahko zgodilo nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: You have to live there as a condition of your job.

sense.def:
Kadar privolimo, da bomo nekaj storili
on condition that something else happens
, sprejmemo, da bomo tisto naredili samo, če se prej zgodi nekaj drugega ali se o tem dogovorimo.

seg.quote: He has agreed to come on condition that there won't be any publicity.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
a condition
lahko poimenujemo tudi neko bolezen ali kakšno drugo zdravstveno težavo.

Kadar je človek
conditioned to think or do something
, nekaj misli ali počne na določen način zaradi svoje vzgoje ali izobrazbe.

seg.quote: Men had been conditioned to regard women as their inferiors.
It is very difficult to overcome your early conditioning.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
out of condition
, ni zdrav in je telesno šibak.
